argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Undue hardship due to rent increase exceeding tenant's ability to pay based on income
argumentsAndDecisions.violatedCode: CSFRA Sec. 1707(d) and Chapter 7, Section C
argumentsAndDecisions.reimbursement: Full refund of rent increase from Sept 1-Oct 9, 2022; reduction of banked increases exceeding 5% AGA through Aug 31, 2023
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: Tenant provided credible evidence of income significantly below AMI threshold of $117,950
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Tenant's income proven to be significantly below 100% of median household income, demonstrating undue hardship

argumentsAndDecisions.complaintSummary: Landlord failed to register property with rent stabilization program
argumentsAndDecisions.reimbursement: No rent increases permitted during non-compliance period (before Oct 10, 2022)
argumentsAndDecisions.respondentHadNotice: Yes, documented in HO Ex. 7, 8, and 9
argumentsAndDecisions.evidenceAssessment: City records confirmed non-compliance with registration requirements
argumentsAndDecisions.impactAssessment: Registration non-compliance prevented landlord from implementing any rent increases

petitions.respondent: Del Medio Manor, LLP and Calson Property Management
